Add a list of tasks

Source: R/tasks.R
add_tasks_in_project.Rd

Add a list of tasks

add_tasks_in_project(
  project_id,
  tasks_list,
  try_again = 3,
  time_try_again = 3,
  verbose = TRUE,
  responsible = NULL,
  token = get_todoist_api_token()
)

Arguments

project_id

id of project
tasks_list

list of tasks
try_again

start again the request
time_try_again

number of tries
verbose

make it talk
responsible

add people in project
token

token

See also

[add_task_in_project()]

Examples

if (FALSE) {
add_project("my_proj") %>%
   add_tasks_in_project(list("First task", "Second task"))
}
